page.title: 19SPORT
page.content:
Llanelli is a great sporting town, with rugby union being the traditional game.The Llanelli Rugby Team are known as "The Scarlets" and have a great following in the area.In 1985 they defeated Cardiff in the Schweppes cup final at Cardiff Arms Park.There are also two football teams in the South Wales League and a successful cricket team. We have many school teams who play regularly against other schools.We have a 11-a-side football team as well as a 5-a-side team,a 7-a-side rugby team,a cricket team and a netball team.
{.........by Leigh Roberts { and Christopher Hamlyn
